titles.title: Udall-Eisenhower Arctic Wilderness Act

To preserve the Arctic coastal plain of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge, Alaska, as wilderness in recognition of its extraordinary natural ecosystems and for the permanent good of present and future generations of Americans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E20)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Udall-Eisenhower Arctic Wilderness Act - Designates specified lands within the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge (ANWR) as wilderness and components of the National Wilderness Preservation System.
